headline: Unless you aim to be Police Inspector, save your time to find other interns
pros:
1. Good Salary compared to other general interns(HKD 9800 per month)
2. Low skill (just need the skills graduated from primary school)
3. Know clearly about the selection of Police Inspector (some Inspector Police will give you tips and help you to train to enter Police Inspector, but not in an organised way)
4. May meet some seniors in Hong Kong Police Force (therefore you may have a easier life during the selection or after you successfully become Police Inspector)
cons:
1. No wifi (we could not access the computer due to the sensitivity of information. However, we need to connect the wifi for laptop. Therefore, we may need to do it after working hour or buy more mobile data or buy wifi egg)
2. Less work distributed (nearly free at all time)
3. Low-skilled work distributed (eg. make the boards)
4. Much less opportunity to learn technical skills
